医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
嚼口香糖预防早产怀孕期间含木糖醇的口香糖可显着减少早产和低出生体重，为改善孕产妇健康提供简单的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Chewing-gum-to-prevent-preterm-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Chewing-gum-to-prevent-preterm-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae87c479-38bc-4b07-b36e-f65c77e3715a Tue, 19 Nov 2024 04:58:00 -0500 Chewing gum to prevent preterm birth
到 2050 年，美国三分之二的成年人和三分之一的青少年可能面临肥胖问题美国不断上升的肥胖率，尤其是青少年的肥胖率，构成了重大的健康风险，需要立即采取行动并制定量身定制的预防策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/By-2050-two-thirds-of-adults-and-one-third-of-adolescents-could-face-obesity-in-the-US。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/By-2050-two-thirds-of-adults-and-one-third-of-adolescents-could-face-obesity-in-the-US。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc00262d-9442-4a97-b53b-cfd66461bf30 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 04:45:00 -0500 By 2050, two-thirds of adults and one-third of adolescents could face obesity in the US
减肥后很长一段时间，肥胖的记忆都会在脂肪细胞中挥之不去肥胖引起的表观遗传变化在减肥后持续存在，改变脂肪细胞功能并增加体重反弹的风险，影响代谢健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Memories-of-obesity-can-linger-in-fat-cells-long-after-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Memories-of-obesity-can-linger-in-fat-cells-long-after-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23946b12-cdf8-4952-9ecd-247a83ae4483 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 04:37:00 -0500 Memories of obesity can linger in fat cells long after weight loss
研究人员探索婴儿抗生素使用与儿童哮喘之间的联系途径研究发现，在生命的第一年使用抗生素是儿童哮喘发生的危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Researchers-explore-pathways-linking-infant-antibiotic-use-to-childhood-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Researchers-explore-pathways-linking-infant-antibiotic-use-to-childhood-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4339d98e-d2cd-4432-8c84-e8ea6ac35b4b Tue, 19 Nov 2024 01:36:01 -0500 Researchers explore pathways linking infant antibiotic use to childhood asthma
研究定义了 Chiari 1 型畸形的三种亚型以指导治疗大约 4% 的人口患有先天性脑畸形，研究人员一直未能找到原因和治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-defines- Three-subtypes-of-Chiari-type-1-malformation-to-guide-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-defines- Three-subtypes-of-Chiari-type-1-malformation-to-guide-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=663ec27b-26dc-4a65-8f39-0d5c04130286 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 01:33:25 -0500 Study defines three subtypes of Chiari type-1 malformation to guide treatment
波士顿大学医学院获得拨款扩大阿片类药物使用障碍治疗教育波士顿大学 Chobanian & Avedisian 医学院继续教育中心 (BU CCE) 最近从马萨诸塞州医学注册委员会获得了为期两年的 400,000 美元拨款，用于创建继续教育计划，以增加医生和高级实践提供者的数量，将阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 的治疗纳入其初级保健实践。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/BU-School-of-Medicine-receives-grant-to-expand-education-on-opioid-use-disorder-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/BU-School-of-Medicine-receives-grant-to-expand-education-on-opioid-use-disorder-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22749c46-c1e3-42b6-96d9-8d572938aa8c Tue, 19 Nov 2024 01:20:47 -0500
多发性硬化症药物可以帮助工作记忆力下降的人Fampridine 目前用于改善多发性硬化症患者的步行能力。一项新的研究表明，它还可以帮助那些工作记忆力下降的人，如精神分裂症或抑郁症等心理健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Multiple-sclerosis-drug-could-help-individuals-with-reduced-working-memory.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Multiple-sclerosis-drug-could-help-individuals-with-reduced-working-memory.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1cd96fd-acd2-419c-a819-bd89024b3b43 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 01:06:19 -0500 Multiple sclerosis drug could help individuals with reduced working memory
研究表明人工智能可以预测三阴性乳腺癌的预后瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员通过分析肿瘤内的某些免疫细胞，研究了不同的人工智能模型预测三阴性乳腺癌预后的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-shows-AI-can-predict-prognosis-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241119/Study-shows-AI-can-predict-prognosis-in-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a3f949b-ad85-4339-8793-193703fee815 Tue, 19 Nov 2024 00:46:00 -0500 Study shows AI can predict prognosis in triple-negative breast cancer
酒精如何影响男性健康这项研究探讨了饮酒如何扰乱新陈代谢、损害肝脏和损害男性生殖健康，强调了复杂的机制和公共卫生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/How-alcohol-impacts-male-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/How-alcohol-impacts-male-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f45b38d6-d837-49e7-ac37-c9575c3da0cc Mon, 18 Nov 2024 23:51:00 -0500 How alcohol impacts male health
NIH 开发人工智能算法以简化临床试验匹配美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员开发了一种人工智能 (AI) 算法，有助于加快将潜在志愿者与 ClinicalTrials.gov 上列出的相关临床研究试验进行匹配的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NIH-develops-AI-algorithm-to-streamline-clinical-Trial-matching.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NIH-develops-AI-algorithm-to-streamline-clinical-Trial-matching.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58753d46-6ff4-4a0c-8d18-2c7796e4a3e9 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 23:50:17 -0500 NIH develops AI algorithm to streamline clinical trial matching
